roleset.name: coat with breadcrumbs

role.descr: Meat, entity coated in bread crumbs
Bread crumbs themselves, usually specifies type of crumb

roleset.note: Roleset based on parallel addiitons to VN, PB, and sense groupings. VerbNet class butter-9.9.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: This is much easier than *PRO* crumbing fish with flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.

example.name: With secondary predication
example.text: She crumbed the chicken raw and fried it.

roleset.name: break up into crumbs

roles.note: Instrument seems rare for this verb.

role.descr: bread, entity broken up into crumbs

roleset.note: Roleset based on parallel addiitons to VN, PB, and sense groupings. VerbNet class carve 21.2-2

example.name: With ArgM-GOL
example.text: He crumbed the bread into the milk.

example.name: With temporal
example.text: She crumbed the bread before feeding it to the birds.
example.arg: before feeding it to the birds

roleset.name: remove, clean crumbs from a table
roleset.note: Roleset based on parallel addiitons to VN, PB, and sense groupings. No relevant VerbNet class found.

example.name: Fancy dinner
example.text: [A designated catering staff]-1 is trained in white-glove service, pouring wine, and *PRO*-1 crumbing tables.
